name: Free Currency Converter for WooCommerce
author: onlined

sections.description:
Free Currency Converter for WooCommerce is a powerful plugin that seamlessly integrates real-time currency conversion into your online store. By leveraging the ExchangeRate-API, this plugin provides accurate and up-to-date currency conversions, making it easier for international customers to understand product pricing in USD.

Key Features

  1. Real-time Currency Conversion: Utilizes ExchangeRate-API for accurate, up-to-the-minute exchange rates.
  2. User-friendly Interface: Implements an intuitive combobox for easy currency selection.
  3. Visual Currency Representation: Displays country flags alongside currency options for quick recognition.
  4. Smart Search Functionality: Allows users to search for currencies by name, code, or symbol.
  5. Responsive Design: Ensures a seamless experience across all devices.
  6. Automatic Currency Detection: Suggests currency based on user’s IP address.
  7. SEO-friendly: Improves user experience, potentially boosting your store’s search engine rankings.
  8. Easy Integration: Works out of the box with WooCommerce, no complex setup required.

External Services

This plugin uses the ExchangeRate-API to convert store currency to USD. The plugin makes requests to ‘https://api.exchangerate-api.com/v4/latest/’ followed by the currency code to get the conversion rates.

Please note that this plugin relies on the ExchangeRate-API, a 3rd party service. Here are some important links related to this service:
– Service Link: https://api.exchangerate-api.com
– Terms of Use: https://www.exchangerate-api.com/terms
– Privacy Policy: https://www.exchangerate-api.com/terms
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/free-currency-converter directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the Settings->Free Currency Converter screen to configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin free to use?

Yes, the Free Currency Converter for WooCommerce is completely free to use.

How often are the exchange rates updated?

The exchange rates are updated in real-time using the ExchangeRate-API, ensuring the most current conversion rates.

Can I customize the appearance of the currency converter?

Yes, the plugin comes with customizable CSS. You can modify the css/custom-style.css file to match your website’s design.
